status.html: Home run is closed due to tubing hill maintenance.

properties.notes: Groomed to Oh No for access to Triple Treat
properties.name: Too Much

properties.short_description: A performance Woodward Mountain Park zone which features medium and large sized jumps, box and rail features, will challenge and excite skiers and snowboarders from intermediate to pro level.

long_description.what: Central Park is the largest zone in Copper’s Woodward Mountain Park, with a huge variety of jump and rail lines that seem to go on forever.
long_description.who: Intermediate to advanced terrain park users.
long_description.where: Take a skiers right off Easy Feelin' under the Woodward Express lift.

properties.name: Central Park on Loverly

properties.short_description: A skier or rider’s first introduction to featured terrain and entry-level jumps and jibs built low to the snow surface.

long_description.what:
A skier or rider’s first introduction to featured terrain and entry-level jumps and jibs built low to the snow surface.

*pass or day ticket required
long_description.who: Beginner, intermediate and expert skiers and riders who have interest in featured terrain.
long_description.where: On the Roundabout trail under the Kokomo Express lift.
long_description.when: You have interest in featured terrain, but little to no experience skiing or riding it.

properties.name: Dino Ridge Progression Park on Roundabout

properties.short_description: A low level family race track of mellow banked slalom turns to tame cross course features and built on a gentle enough pitch to prevent excess speed.

long_description.what: Imagine your favorite natural terrain gully, but groomed and enhanced with minimal to moderate shaping. The Woodward Family Cross zone is a low level family race track of mellow banked slalom turns to tame cross course features and built on a gentle enough pitch to prevent excess speed.
long_description.where: Access Woodward Family Cross from the top of American Flyer, off of High Point.

properties.name: Family Cross on High Point

properties.short_description: Introduces fall-line contours and banked turns to familiarize skiers and riders with their edges, turning, pumping and compression.

long_description.what:
Introduces fall-line contours and banked turns to familiarize skiers and riders with their edges, turning, pumping and compression.

*pass or day ticket required
long_description.who: First time to beginner skiers and riders
long_description.where: At Green Acres, accessible from Eagles Landing in Center Village.
long_description.when: Learning to edge and turn on your skis or snowboard

properties.name: Green Acres Progression Park

properties.short_description: A skier or rider’s first introduction to pitch to develop the building blocks of starting and stopping.

long_description.what: A skier or rider’s first introduction to pitch to develop the building blocks of starting and stopping.
long_description.who: First time to beginner skiers and riders
long_description.when: Building foundational skills for skiing and riding

properties.name: Koko's Progression Park on Roundabout

properties.short_description: Inspired and designed by professional snowboarder Danny Davis, Peace Park focuses on fun, flow, and non-linear park progression to create the ultimate environment for creative expression.

long_description.what: Inspired and designed by professional snowboarder Danny Davis, Peace Park focuses on fun, flow, and non-linear park progression to create the ultimate environment for creative expression.
long_description.who: Beginner, intermediate and expert skiers and riders looking to expression their creativity through freestyle terrain
long_description.where: Access from the top of American Flyer off of High Point
long_description.when: You don’t want to go big, you just want to have fun

properties.name: Peace Park on Vein Glory

properties.short_description: 13' half pipe perfect for training pipe skills.

long_description.where: Immediately underneath the top of the Woodward Express chairlift, at the top of Minor Matter.

properties.name: Pipe Dream on Vein Glory

properties.short_description: Inspired by professional snowboarder Red Gerard’s personal backyard, this hike park embraces DIY rail jam creativity.

long_description.what:
Inspired by professional snowboarder Red Gerard’s personal backyard, this hike park embraces DIY rail jam creativity.

* Pass or day ticket required
long_description.who: Beginner, intermediate & advanced freestyle terrain skiers and riders / jib enthusiasts
long_description.where: In Center Village in between the American Eagle and American Flyer lifts.
long_description.when: You want skip the lift, hike the park, and session some jib features

properties.name: Red's Backyard on Loverly Lane

properties.short_description:
A playground on snow where first time skiers and riders start their progression journey by developing the feeling of sliding on snow.

 

*pass or day ticket required

long_description.what: A playground on snow where first time skiers and riders start their progression journey by developing the feeling of sliding on snow.
long_description.who: First time to beginner skiers and riders
long_description.where: By the Easy Rider lift in Eagles Landing, Center Village.
long_description.when: Building foundational skills for skiing and riding

properties.name: Start Park at Easy Rider

properties.short_description: Perfect for skiers and snowboarders looking to perfect their halfpipe riding skills.

long_description.what:
The superpipe is perfect for dialing in your pipe line.

*pass or day ticket required
long_description.who: Skiers and snowboarders looking to perfect their halfpipe riding skills
long_description.where: At the bottom of Main Vein and Carefree.

properties.name: Superpipe on Main Vein

properties.notes:
Daytime Route 

.98 miles, 1068 vertical feet
properties.name: Copperfield (Route 5)
